There should be a related exception in your log - it means we could not 
instantiate the contributed debug model presentation. Do you have the .log 
entry?

Created an attachment (id=7171)
Here's the complete log file

There are severl NPEs in the log when we tried to instantiate an extension. 
This looks like a lower-level problem in the osgi support. Moving to Core for 
comment. For example:

the NPE and we can protect against it.
Can you still reproduce this problem?

moving to Pascal. this feels like the one we just fixed with the registry being 
out of sync

Since a lot of improvements have been done in the area of registry management 
and unfortunately we do not have a reproduceable test case, I'm closing this 
bug. Let us know if this still occur.
